_usage: Edit this file and load it in the notebook, or use the inline CONFIG in the notebook

database_searches.label: OpenAlex Search - Quantum Biodiversity
database_searches.search_query: (quantum computing OR quantum machine learning OR QML OR QAOA OR quantum annealing) AND (biodiversity OR conservation OR species distribution OR ecological network OR population genetics)

database_searches.label: arXiv Search - Quantum Biodiversity
database_searches.search_query: (quantum computing OR quantum machine learning OR QML OR QAOA OR quantum annealing) AND (biodiversity OR conservation OR species distribution OR ecological network OR population genetics)
database_searches._notes: Essential for quantum computing preprints. Categories: quant-ph, cs.LG, cs.AI, q-bio

database_searches.label: Semantic Scholar Search - Quantum Biodiversity
database_searches.search_query: quantum computing biodiversity conservation species distribution
database_searches._notes: AI-enhanced search. Fields: CS, Biology, Environmental Science

database_searches.label: PubMed Search - Quantum Biodiversity
database_searches.search_query: (quantum computing[Title/Abstract] OR quantum machine learning[Title/Abstract] OR quantum annealing[Title/Abstract]) AND (biodiversity[Title/Abstract] OR conservation[Title/Abstract] OR species distribution[Title/Abstract] OR population genetics[Title/Abstract])

database_searches.label: IEEE Xplore Search (OA) - Quantum Biodiversity
database_searches.search_query: ("quantum computing" OR "quantum machine learning" OR "QML" OR "QAOA" OR "quantum annealing") AND ("biodiversity" OR "conservation" OR "species distribution" OR "ecological network" OR "population genetics")
database_searches._notes: OA content only due to paywall

database_searches.label: Europe PMC Search - Quantum Biodiversity
database_searches.search_query: (quantum computing OR quantum machine learning) AND (biodiversity OR conservation OR species distribution)
database_searches._notes: Complements PubMed with European repository content

search_execution_dataset.label: Quantum Computing for Biodiversity - Search Execution Results
search_execution_dataset.deduplication_methodology: Records from all 6 databases combined using Zotero. Automatic deduplication on DOI and title fields. Manual review of potential duplicates (similar titles, matching authors). Expected high overlap between OpenAlex, Semantic Scholar, and PubMed.
search_execution_dataset.review_methodology: Single reviewer screening with validation by second reviewer on 20% sample given emerging interdisciplinary nature of the topic.
search_execution_dataset.screening_methodology: Two-stage screening: (1) Title and abstract screening against PICO criteria - must address quantum computing methods AND biodiversity/conservation applications, (2) Full-text review for methodological rigor and relevance. Exclusions: opinion pieces, editorials without methods, theoretical quantum physics without biological application.
search_execution_dataset.exclusion_breakdown: Title/abstract exclusions: Not about quantum computing (XXX), Not about biodiversity/conservation (XXX), Not primary research (XXX). Full-text exclusions: Full text not available (XXX), Not in English (XXX), Outside date range (XXX), Other (XXX).
search_execution_dataset.limitations: Limitations: (1) Scopus and Web of Science replaced with OpenAlex and Semantic Scholar due to subscription access requirements, (2) IEEE Xplore restricted to Open Access content only due to paywall constraints, (3) Emerging field with inconsistent terminology may affect recall, (4) Grey literature not systematically searched.
